front.title: On the use of HTTP as a Substrate for Other Protocols

abstract.t: Recently there has been widespread interest in using HypertextTransport Protocol (HTTP) as a substrate for other applications-levelprotocols. This document relates current IESG and IAB thinking ontechnical particulars of such use, including use of default ports, URLschemes, and HTTP security mechanisms. This thinking is subject tochange as discussion continues and more experience is gained with suchuse.
